text: By pinto disoza Oct 17, 2015 Whether you are looking for some mid-week fun or a weekend bash, you probably will want to spend your evenings on your own terms. While the official parties and the regular settings have been in vogue for long, they may not appeal to you in terms of enjoying yourself. Going on long drives and sitting by the beach-side restaurants are just grind of the mill affair you have done umpteen numbers of times. So what best are you left with? But of course, the exciting night clubs in the town that you allow you to be yourself and reel in your mood too! The Sprawling Expanse The nightlife in Mumbai is as exciting as the city itself, with several nightclubs operating across the city. In case you are looking for a place that is both exotic, as well as exclusive, you will not be disappointed either. Whether you are a local or a visitor from across the shores, you are sure to be impressed with the sprawling setting of some of these exclusive clubs. Some are set against the backdrop of the Arabian sea with state-of-the-art d√©cor that is sure to touch your taste for the exclusive. The magic interiors of these exclusive nightclubs will soon absorb you into the dance mania and get your hair down. You can groove till the wee hours together with the top DJs playing international, as well some of the most popular Mumbai hits. The awesome ambience with the surreal sound systems is sure to have you craving for more. With the entry reserved for special people like you at a premium, you can enjoy the one on one drink as your adrenaline sets itself pumping high. The Special Nights These special places are great as nightlife in Mumbai destinations when you are a gang. Choose the mid-week special of fashion and dance combination and allow yourself to go wild with laughter. For the special drink session, drop-in with a crowd and ignite the dance floor swaying to the top numbers by the reputed DJs who know how to build up the tempo of excitement. Weekends, of course, are very special at these hot spots night clubs with the popular DJs and also some celebrities dropping in for the extra dose of fun. The VIP Facilities When glamor is in your blood, you cannot disappoint yourself on the Saturday nights when it comes to nightlife in Mumbai. Be part of the select and the glamorous crowd and sway your way with your partner in the electric settings. It is the best way that you can think of sizzling up your Saturday nights when you want to beat them all at being able to enjoy yourself.
